forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Patchy fog before 9am. Mostly sunny. High near 66, with temperatures falling to around 64 in the afternoon. South southwest wind 3 to 8 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 52. Southwest wind 2 to 8 mph.

weather_report:
As the day unfolds in Downtown San Francisco, early morning fog lingers like a gossamer curtain, gradually giving way to the brilliance of a sunny afternoon. The air is crisp and imbued with the freshness that follows the night. Underneath the glow of a soft sun, temperatures are poised to hover around a comfortable 66 degrees, inching downwards as the afternoon advances, inviting that delightful chill typical of the Bay. The gentle whispers of the wind, blowing south-southwest at a moderate pace, bring hints of salt and sea, a reminder of the proximity to the ocean.

Dressing for today demands an adaptable approach; a light sweater or cardigan would pair nicely with a tee or blouse during the warmer brilliance of midday, while slightly heavier layers might be prudent as the day transitions into evening warmth, settling in around a tender 52 degrees. With the allure of clear skies, this is a splendid time to indulge in the simple pleasures of urban life. Consider taking a leisurely stroll along the wharf, savoring the salt-kissed air and the laughter of passersby, or perhaps exploring a cozy café, enjoying a quiet moment over a perfectly brewed coffee. The world feels inviting and vibrant, ready for those eager to embrace its charms amid the soft embrace of the fading fog.
